63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:16): anyone know the package name for gcc, or where I can get a list of packages?
63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:21): hm, dunno what version of gcc I shoudl be getting... I'm still comfortable with 2.95, but its so old I dunno if anything works with it anymore.
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:22): use the one that comes with soalris 10,  usr/sfw/bin/gcc
63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:23): why doesn't it give users sane default paths :(  .. you know, like ones with some apps able to be found? :P
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:23): Zero, solaris gives you more choices...
63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:23): hm thats odd.  I just completely lost connectivity to my box.  brb.
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:23): your users shouldn't have to have gcc in there path, and if your company doesn't like freeware apps then don't put them in your path

63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:25): no idea wtf just happened but I can't ping the box, nothing.  it's dead... but still running *sigh*.  I hate having to get out console cables and walking to other rooms.
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:26): yeah i guess the t1000 doesn't have the ilom module
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:27): its a module that gives you console over  ethernet instead of  serial
63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:27): oh, no it has that, I just haven't configured it.
63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:27): I don't have any spare network cables for it.
63fe657d12300796d472e0d733381d76 (11:27): gotta bring the crimper in tomorrow to make up some more.

8152b466b1a99b2b2d12f22978c7e887 (11:51): hey anyone know how i can disable remote login for a user....apart from root....the user can only connect on the console but no ssh or telnet for them
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:53): matjing,  man sshd_config  look at  denyusers
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:53): and disable telnet its only a nightmare waiting to happen
8152b466b1a99b2b2d12f22978c7e887 (11:54): i want a user like lets say oracle to not be able to connect
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (11:55): matjing,  man sshd_config  look at  denyusers
